resources: My Movies App Main image "Background image MOVIE TRAILER Released: Overview titles </!--> Avengers: Infinity War Black Panther Deadpool 2 Guardians Of The Galaxy Interstellar Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom Ocean\'s 8 The First Purge The Meg Thor: Ragnarok release dates </!--> 2018—01—01 urls </!--> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xjDjIWPwcPU https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D86RtevtfrA https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d96cjJhvlMA https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6ZfuNTqbHE8 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zSWdZVtXT7E https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vn9mMeWcgoM https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MFWF9dU5Zc0 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UL29y0ah92w https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=udm5jUA-2bs https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ue80QwXMRHg overviews </!--> As the Avengers and their allies have continued to protect the world from threats too large for any one hero to handle, a new danger has emerged from the cosmic shadows: Thanos. A despot of intergalactic infamy, his goal is to collect all six Infinity Stones, artifacts of unimaginable power, and use them to inflict his twisted will on all of reality. Everything the Avengers have fought for has led up to this moment - the fate of Earth and existence itself has never been more uncertain. TChalla, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and must confront a challenger from his country past. Imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, Thor must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela. A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe. A group of scientists exploring the Marianas Trench encounter the largest marine predator that has ever existed - the Megalodon. Americas third political party, the New Founding Fathers of America, comes to power and conducts an experiment: no laws for 12 hours on Staten Island. No one has to stay on the island, but $5,000 is given to anyone who does. Debbie Ocean gathers an all-female crew to attempt an impossible heist at New York Citys yearly Met Gala. When the islands dormant volcano begins roaring to life, Owen and Claire mount a campaign to rescue the remaining dinosaurs from this extinction-level event. A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanitys survival. Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (a.k.a. Deadpool), brings together a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg Cable. menu items </!--> Open Task Activity Open Handler Activity Open Background Service Activity Counter Fragment Create Start Cancel This is AsyncTask Activity This is Handler Activity START INTENT SERVICE START SERVICE The Progress Worker progress Required Network Required Charging Required Battery Not Low Open WorkerManager Activity ENQUEUE WORK CANCEL WORK delete all mvoies from db button download image download icon Permission needed To be able downloading requested file the app need to be granted to access your files Defualt channel Default channel for notifications %1$d %% Downloading…
